Package project.capstone.Services

Interface UsersServices

@Transactional @Service public interface UsersServices
Service interface for managing users.

  • Method Details

    • addUsers

      project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO addUsers(project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO usersDTO)
      Adds a new user.
      Parameters:
      usersDTO - The UsersDTO object containing user details.
      Returns:
      The UsersDTO object representing the newly added user.

    • addAdmin

      project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO addAdmin(project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO usersDTO)
      Adds a new administrator (admin) user.
      Parameters:
      usersDTO - The UsersDTO object containing admin user details.
      Returns:
      The UsersDTO object representing the newly added admin user.

    • deleteUserById

      void deleteUserById(String userId)
      Deletes a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to delete.

    • viewAllUsers

      List<project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO> viewAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users.
      Returns:
      List of UsersDTO objects representing all users.

    • viewUserById

      project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO viewUserById(String userId)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The UsersDTO object representing the user.

    • viewUserByMail

      project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO viewUserByMail(String userId)
      Retrieves a user by their email (username).
      Parameters:
      userId - The email (username) of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The UsersDTO object representing the user.

    • updateUser

      project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO updateUser(String userId, project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO usersDTO)
      Updates a user's information.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to update.
      usersDTO - The UsersDTO object containing updated user details.
      Returns:
      The UsersDTO object representing the updated user.

    • banUser

      void banUser(String userId)
      Bans a user by setting their status to inactive.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to ban.

    • unbanUser

      void unbanUser(String userId)
      Unbans a user by setting their status to active.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to unban.

    • verifyUser

      String verifyUser(String userName, String password)
      Verifies a user's credentials and returns their role.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      A string representing the user's role.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the username or password is invalid.
